TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PreviewKeyDownEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#65)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#65)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的金鑰，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Alt As Boolean
public: property bool Alt { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否按下 ALT 鍵。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the ALT key was pressed.

value.span: 如果按下 ALT 鍵則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, .
